name: Refreshing Corn Salad
author: Jennifer Murray
summary: This is such a fresh tasting salad with ribbons of basil leaves throughout. Add dressing in to your liking.
ingredients: 6 ears fresh corn, shucked and desilked
¼ cup fresh basil leaves, cut into very thin strips
directions: Fill a bowl with ice water
Stir sugar into a large pot filled with water; bring to a boil
Add corn; cook until kernels are softened, about 2 minutes
Drain and transfer corn to ice water until cooled; drain
Cut kernels from the cob with a sharp knife
Combine corn, Roma tomatoes, red bell pepper, and green onions in a bowl
Stir sour cream, mayonnaise, basil, Parmesan cheese, and cider vinegar together in a bowl until dressing is smooth; season with salt and pepper
Chill in the refrigerator until flavors combine, 8 hours to overnight
